cmd-extension

Gets the right command file extension on Windows

Installation

<npm|yarn|pnpm> add cmd-extension

Usage

'use strict'
const CMD_EXTENSION = require('cmd-extension')

console.log(CMD_EXTENSION)
//> .CMD

License

MIT © Zoltan Kochan
